_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

title.en: A new image has been received
title.sv: En ny bild har tagits emot
title.es: Se ha recibido una nueva imagen

title.en: A new message has been received
title.es: Se ha recibido un nuevo mensaje

hint.en: Phone number: Use with country code! e.g. (+31 -> +31601020304) || Groups: Copy the invite link of your WhatsApp group and paste it here. Based on the link, the app will know which group to send a message to.
hint.nl: Telefoonnummer: Gebruik met landcode! bijv. (+31 -> +31601020304) || Groepen: Kopieer de uitnodigingslink van je WhatsApp-groep en plak deze hier. Op basis van de link weet de app naar welke groep het bericht moet worden verzonden.
hint.de: Telefonnummer: Mit L√§ndervorwahl verwenden! z.B. (+49 -> +491234567890) || Gruppen: Kopiere den Einladungslink deiner WhatsApp-Gruppe und f√ºge ihn hier ein. Basierend auf dem Link wei√ü die App, in welche Gruppe sie eine Nachricht senden soll.
hint.fr: Num√©ro de t√©l√©phone : Utilisez-le avec le code pays ! Ex. (+33 -> +33601020304) || Groupes : Copiez le lien d'invitation de votre groupe WhatsApp et collez-le ici. En fonction du lien, l'application saura dans quel groupe envoyer un message.
hint.it: Numero di telefono: Utilizzare con il codice del paese! Es. (+39 -> +393123456789) || Gruppi: Copia il link di invito del tuo gruppo WhatsApp e incollalo qui. In base al link, l'applicazione sapr√† a quale gruppo inviare un messaggio.
hint.sv: Telefonnummer: Anv√§nd med landskod! t.ex. (+46 -> +46701234567) || Grupper: Kopiera inbjudningsl√§nken till din WhatsApp-grupp och klistra in den h√§r. Baserat p√• l√§nken kommer appen att veta vilken grupp den ska skicka ett meddelande till.
hint.no: Telefonnummer: Bruk med landskode! f.eks. (+47 -> +4798765432) || Grupper: Kopier invitasjonslenken til WhatsApp-gruppen din og lim den inn her. Basert p√• lenken vil appen vite hvilken gruppe den skal sende en melding til.
hint.es: N√∫mero de tel√©fono: ¬°Usar con c√≥digo de pa√≠s! ej. (+34 -> +34601020304) || Grupos: Copia el enlace de invitaci√≥n de tu grupo de WhatsApp y p√©galo aqu√≠. Basado en el enlace, la aplicaci√≥n sabr√° a qu√© grupo enviar un mensaje.
hint.da: Telefonnummer: Brug med landekode! f.eks. (+45 -> +4512345678) || Grupper: Kopier linket til din WhatsApp-gruppeinvitation og inds√¶t det her. Baseret p√• linket vil appen vide, hvilken gruppe der skal sendes en besked til.
hint.pl: Numer telefonu: U≈ºyj z kodem kraju! np. (+31 -> +31601020304) || Grupy: Skopiuj link do zaproszenia do swojej grupy WhatsApp i wklej go tutaj. Na podstawie linku aplikacja bƒôdzie wiedzieƒá, do kt√≥rej grupy wys≈Çaƒá wiadomo≈õƒá.

text.en:
1. You are the only one responsible for the messages and the content that you sent. Remember that messages will be sent from your phone number.

  2. This app is not responsible for any ban or block performed by WhatsApp on your number. And the developer cant do anything to unblock it

  3. Never send a Whatsapp message to a new conversation. Make sure the conversation had interaction with your number before you send a message from this app

  4. This project is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with WhatsApp or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. The official WhatsApp website can be found at https://whatsapp.com. 'WhatsApp' as well as related names, marks, emblems and images are registered trademarks of their respective owners
1. It is not possible to connect more than 2 WhatsApp clients to this app.
